hero.title: The Future, Secured
hero.subtitle: An institutional investment DAO leveraging AI-driven strategies to build an evergreen legacy in the decentralized world

about.title: Institutional Intelligence On-Chain
about.description: Open Libra is a critical long-running endowment designed to help humanity hedge its bets on a future dominated by artificial intelligence. We secure dignity for our members while investing in acceleration of dignity for the public good.
about.mission: Our on-chain Investment DAO serves as an institutional vehicle built to address the most urgent needs of a rapidly changing world, ensuring a resilient and purpose-driven future.

aboutHighlights.title: 100+ Year Horizon
aboutHighlights.description: Built for enduring impact with a permanent, legacy-focused perspective.

aboutHighlights.title: AI-Driven Strategy
aboutHighlights.description: Leveraging artificial intelligence to identify and invest in the most promising future-facing technologies.

aboutHighlights.title: Regulatory Compliance
aboutHighlights.description: Trustworthy and compliant framework designed for institutional investors.

foundation.title: Trustworthy & Compliant
foundation.description: The reliable and secure choice for institutional investors, signaling stability and steadfast commitment to regulatory compliance.

foundation.title: Forward-Thinking & Intelligent
foundation.description: Not just participating in the future, but building it through strategic intelligence and deep understanding of AI and decentralized technology.

foundation.title: Independent & Enduring
foundation.description: Built for a 100+ year time horizon with strength, self-governance, and a permanent legacy-focused perspective.

strategy.title: AI Plus Strategy
strategy.description: Our investment approach combines artificial intelligence with strategic human oversight to identify and capitalize on emerging opportunities in the decentralized ecosystem.
riskManagement: Diversified portfolio across sectors and geographies

cta.title: Building an Evergreen Legacy
cta.description: Join us in pioneering a new paradigm of AI-driven investment that secures the future while preserving human dignity.
